name: contest-pass
effect: Allows the trainer to enter Contests.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: The pass required for entering POKéMON CONTESTS.
flavor_text.emerald: The pass required for entering POKéMON CONTESTS.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The pass required for entering POKéMON CONTESTS. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on it.
